onset.Description: Position of event marker in seconds relative to the start.

duration.Description: Duration of the event in seconds.

Levels.checker-right: checker board stimuli on right half

Levels.checker-f1: checker stimuli with spatial filter level 1

Levels.press-right: participant pressed the right most key

Levels.chan_manual: The interactive label (modified by analysts interactively or by a pipeline decision along with other labels) typically used to indicate which channels are considered artifactual for any reason.
Levels.chan_ch_sd: Pipeline decision flag indicating that channels were too often outliers compared to other channels for the measure of standard deviation of voltage within one second epochs.
Levels.chan_bridge: Pipeline decision flag indicating that channels were outliers for in terms of having high and invariant correlation coefficients to spatially neighbouring channels.
Levels.chan_rank: Pipeline decision identifying the channel that has the least amount of unique information (highest average correlation coefficient to spatially neighbouring channels) to be ignored by ICA in order to account for the rank deficiency of the average referenced data.
Levels.manual: The interactive label (modified by analysts interactively or by a pipeline decision along with other labels) typically used to indicate which time points are considered artifactual for any reason.
Levels.out_task: Based on experimental task events indicating time points outside the duration of any experimental tasks (e.g. breaks, start up and end off times, etc).
Levels.in_leadup_fhbc_fade: Based on experimental task events indicating time points leading into (a few second before and a few seconds after the first experimental event in a block of trials) the duration of the fhbc_onset tasks (Face House Butterfly Checkerboard typical onset stimulus series).
Levels.in_task_fhbc_fade: Based on experimental task events indicating time points within the duration of the fhbc_onset tasks (Face House Butterfly Checkerboard typical onset stimulus series).
Levels.in_leadup_fhbc_onset: Based on experimental task events indicating time points leading into (a few second before and a few seconds after the first experimental event in a block of trials) the duration of the fhbc_onset tasks (Face House Butterfly Checkerboard typical onset stimulus series).
Levels.in_task_fhbc_onset: Based on experimental task events indicating time points within the duration of the fhbc_onset tasks (Face House Butterfly Checkerboard typical onset stimulus series).
